repository.description: Messaging engine for the delivery of SMS, Star Menu and chat messages to diverse audiences in emerging markets and beyond.

payload: {"comment":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/praekelt/vumi/pulls/comments/3025431","id":3025431,"body":"This maybe isn't too important, but  maybe we should wrap `expected_fields` and `ignored_fields` in a `set()` here, since this operand wouldn't work if a tuple or list was passed in for those args.
